quiz_item.error_analysis: 学生易因形近词“hive”（蜂巢）的联想或对其缩写含义的错误猜测而误判HIV的真正含义
quiz_item.sentence: Medical research has made significant progress in treating **HIV**, the virus that weakens the immune system and can lead to AIDS.

option.definition: 人类免疫缺陷病毒（导致艾滋病的病毒）
高强度冲击（high impact的缩写）
人类传染性病毒（human infectious virus的缩写）
